name: com.liangxiegame.qframework
description: QFramework 是一套只有不到 800 行代码的系统设计架构，它包含易上手的架构核心和丰富的生态，可以用这套架构开发任意类型的项目，包括游戏、App、插件、框架、网站、网页、服务器等 | QFramework is a system design architecture with only 800 lines of code. she has easy 2 use architecture and feature bundled ecosystem. it can be used to make game、app、plugin、framework、webpage、server etc.
